name: webrtc-troubleshoot
description: A way to add webrtc troubleshooting to your app

scripts.browserify: node_modules/.bin/browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] --s WebRTCTroubleshooter src/index.js -o dist/webrtc-troubleshooter.bundle.js
scripts.build: npm run browserify && npm run uglify
